com.isolace.sudoku.puzzle.data
Class PuzzleFileUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.isolace.sudoku.puzzle.data.PuzzleFileUtil

public class PuzzleFileUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utilities to work with puzzles files. You probably don't want to use this class as it is used to create puzzles shared across platforms (e.g. iPhone, AppEngine).

See Also:
PuzzleGenerator, Puzzle

writePuzzles

public static final void writePuzzles(Puzzle[] puzzles,
                                      java.lang.String path,
                                      int level)
Create a file for each level with the format: solution0,problem0,solution1,problem1... Currently, used by XCode app to generate pinfo files for iPhone.

See Also:
PuzzleGenerator, Puzzle

readPuzzlesFromFiles

public static final java.util.List<java.util.List<Puzzle>> readPuzzlesFromFiles(java.lang.String path)
Reads files for each level and creates a list of puzzles for each level.

Returns:
List of per level puzzle lists.
